name: Vimconfig
tagline: Easy to use VIM config ( all features enabled )
body:
# INSTRUCTIONS
------------

First clone this repository into your computer.

OS X and Linux:
  * Run install.sh from the current directory
  * Overwrite the existing .vimrc file and .vim folder

Windows:
  * Copy vimrc and vim to the appropriate locations
  * Rename vimrc and vim to the necessary filenames

Once you have completed the above instructions, restart all Vim instances to see
your new environment.

Thank you for using sachet.
This config has been modified by Ch AFleks using a sachet configuration.
Follow me on twitter @chafleks
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
